creator: SM techq - news apps
descriptionHtml:
➢ The app gives you:
One app for all newspapers
No need to install separate apps for each newspaper you want to read.
Easily switch between the newspapers you read often or those you use for quick fact-checks.

Translate foreign news
Read all foreign news from more than 150 countries available in the app with a translation option.
See how the same news is interpreted in your local and foreign press.

descriptionHtml:
If you want to read about business news, stay updated with the sports world or you just want to look at the weather forecast, your local news or world news this is the right app!

Read all the news from its source - no filtration, no aggregation

With NewssQ you have access to more than 6000 news sources (daily/weekly newspapers, news sites, tabloids) from more over than 150 countries for free.

Read the same news in the local and foreign press with ease with an integrated translate option.


Main functionalities included in the app:
➢ Read mode - read only news content without unrelated information
➢ Translate news - read foreign press easily with news translation option
➢ News browser - browse the web for news by keyword
➢ Offline mode - download the news and read it later, even if you don't have an internet connection
➢ Dark mode - available for Android Q and up
➢ Share news - with your family and friends
➢ Favorites - include newspapers in your list from any country
➢ Bookmarks - save stories you don't have time to read, for later
➢ Home newspaper - start reading your favorite newspaper right away
➢ Homepage - long press on back button
➢ Full screen mode
➢ Themes - different color themes
➢ Localized in 20+ languages
➢ and more ...

appDetails.developerAddress: g.k. Darvenitsa bl.17 vh.G , Sofia 1756, Bulgaria

title: NewssQ - newspapers & news

container.value: g.k. Darvenitsa bl.17 vh.G , Sofia 1756, Bulgaria

creator: SM techq - news apps
descriptionHtml:
NewssQ lets you read all newspapers and news sites from all over the world without the need to install a separate app for every newspaper site. Over 150 countries and more than 6,000 news and newspaper sites are included in the program, where you can easily switch between them.

The app has an easy-to-use user interface, so you can easily manage your favorite newspapers and news sites. You can add any newspaper from any country to your favorites list to quickly switch between your most-read newspapers. Even if the news site is not present in the list you can add it just with 2 clicks in the list.

So that you can read any newspaper, regardless of language, there is an integrated translation option in the application. In this way, you can see how the same news is interpreted in the local and foreign press.

With the integrated reading mode, ad blocker (disabled by default) and rarely showing ads in the app, you can read your news without interruption. In addition, with the integrated news browsing function, you can search any news by keyword, so you can easily find news you have read before.

You can bookmark news to read later in online or offline mode. Share the news with your family or friends to inform them and discuss the news later.

App Features Summary:
● Favorites to add news sites from any country to your preferred list
● Translate news articles
● Share the news with friends and family
● Reader Mode for a distraction-free reading experience
● Offline mode for reading news without an internet connection
● Bookmarks to save stories for later reading
● Home screen for quick access to news upon opening the app
● Online newspaper/news site list updates
● Customize Themes to personalize the app's appearance
● Change country at any time to explore news from different regions
● Add/Delete newspaper/news sites
● No annoying advertisements within the app
● Open newspaper/news sites in a standard browser
● Show/Hide drawer on application start
● Show/Hide action bar in read mode
● Categories for Sports News, Tech News, and Auto News
● Localization in 11 languages: English, German (Deutsche), Spanish (Español), Arabic (العربية), Bulgarian (Български), French (français), Japanese (日本語), Portuguese (português), Russian (русский), Turkish (Türkçe), Chinese (中文)


We are continuously improving and adding new functionalities to enhance your news consumption. Don't hesitate to contact us with suggestions or any issues you encounter.
Thank you for choosing our app!

NewssQ lets you read all newspapers and news sites from all over the world without the need to install a separate app for every newspaper site. Over 150 countries and more than 6,000 news and newspaper sites are included in the program, where you can easily switch between them.

The app has an easy-to-use user interface, so you can easily manage your favorite newspapers and news sites. You can add any newspaper from any country to your favorites list to quickly switch between your most-read newspapers. Even if the news site is not present in the list you can add it just with 2 clicks in the list.

So that you can read any newspaper, regardless of language, there is an integrated translation option in the application. In this way, you can see how the same news is interpreted in the local and foreign press.

With the integrated reading mode, ad blocker (disabled by default) and rarely showing ads in the app, you can read your news without interruption. In addition, with the integrated news browsing function, you can search any news by keyword, so you can easily find news you have read before.

You can bookmark news to read later in online or offline mode. Share the news with your family or friends to inform them and discuss the news later.

App Features Summary:
● Favorites to add news sites from any country to your preferred list
● Translate news articles
● Share the news with friends and family
● Reader Mode for a distraction-free reading experience
● Offline mode for reading news without an internet connection
● Bookmarks to save stories for later reading
● Home screen for quick access to news upon opening the app
● Online newspaper/news site list updates
● Customize Themes to personalize the app's appearance
● Change country at any time to explore news from different regions
● Add/Delete newspaper/news sites
● No annoying advertisements within the app
● Open newspaper/news sites in a standard browser
● Show/Hide drawer on application start
● Show/Hide action bar in read mode
● Categories for Sports News, Tech News, and Auto News
● Localization in 11 languages: English, German (Deutsche), Spanish (Español), Arabic (العربية), Bulgarian (Български), French (français), Japanese (日本語), Portuguese (português), Russian (русский), Turkish (Türkçe), Chinese (中文)


We are continuously improving and adding new functionalities to enhance your news consumption. Don't hesitate to contact us with suggestions or any issues you encounter.
Thank you for choosing our app!

creator: SM techq - news apps
descriptionHtml:
NewssQ, her gazete sitesi için ayrı bir uygulama yüklemenize gerek kalmadan dünyanın her yerinden tüm gazeteleri ve haber sitelerini okumanıza olanak tanır. 150'den fazla ülke ve 6.000'den fazla haber ve gazete sitesi, aralarında kolayca geçiş yapabileceğiniz programa dahildir.

Uygulama, kullanımı kolay bir kullanıcı arayüzüne sahiptir, böylece en sevdiğiniz gazeteleri ve haber sitelerini kolayca yönetebilirsiniz. En çok okunan gazeteler arasında hızlıca geçiş yapmak için herhangi bir ülkeden herhangi bir gazeteyi favori listenize ekleyebilirsiniz. Haber sitesi listede olmasa bile sadece 2 tıklama ile listeye ekleyebilirsiniz.

Dil fark etmeksizin her gazeteyi okuyabilmeniz için uygulamada entegre çeviri seçeneği bulunmaktadır. Bu sayede aynı haberin yerli ve yabancı basında nasıl yorumlandığını görebilirsiniz.

Entegre okuma modu, reklam engelleyici (varsayılan olarak devre dışıdır) ve uygulamada nadiren reklam gösterilmesi ile haberlerinizi kesintisiz okuyabilirsiniz. Ayrıca entegre haber tarama fonksiyonu ile herhangi bir haberi anahtar kelimeye göre arayabilirsiniz, bu sayede daha önce okuduğunuz haberlere kolayca ulaşabilirsiniz.

Daha sonra çevrimiçi veya çevrimdışı modda okumak için haberlere yer işareti koyabilirsiniz. Onları bilgilendirmek ve haberleri daha sonra tartışmak için haberleri aileniz veya arkadaşlarınızla paylaşın.

Uygulama Özellikleri Özeti:
● Favoriler, herhangi bir ülkeden haber sitelerini tercih listenize eklemek için
● Haber makalelerini çevirin
● Haberleri arkadaşlarınızla ve ailenizle paylaşın
● Dikkat dağıtmayan bir okuma deneyimi için Okuyucu Modu
● İnternet bağlantısı olmadan haberleri okumak için çevrimdışı mod
● Haberleri daha sonra okumak üzere kaydetmek için yer imleri
● Uygulamayı açtıktan sonra haberlere hızlı erişim için ana ekran
● Çevrimiçi gazete/haber sitesi listesi güncellemeleri
● Uygulamanın görünümünü kişiselleştirmek için Temaları Özelleştirin
● Farklı bölgelerden haberleri keşfetmek için istediğiniz zaman ülkeyi değiştirin
● Gazete/haber sitesi ekleme/silme
● Uygulama içinde can sıkıcı reklamlar yok
● Gazete/haber sitelerini standart bir tarayıcıda açın
● Uygulama başlangıcında çekmeceyi Göster/Gizle
● Okuma modunda işlem çubuğunu Göster/Gizle
● Spor Haberleri, Teknoloji Haberleri ve Otomobil Haberleri Kategorileri

Önerileriniz veya karşılaştığınız herhangi bir sorun için bizimle iletişime geçmekten çekinmeyin.
Uygulamamızı seçtiğiniz için teşekkür ederiz!
